entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
